title: Hear from our former athletes ❤️
description: Read what Coast VA Alumni Athletes have to say about their experiences with our organization.

testimonials.name: Michelle Ferguson
testimonials.title: "Got Me Ready for College Lacrosse"
testimonials.content: As an employer, the platform exceeded my expectations. We swiftly found top-tier talent for our company, thanks to the user-friendly interface and the ability to connect with candidates that perfectly fit our requirements.
